title: Thank you, from John
brief_description: Illustrates the widespread welfare work being carried out by the Save the Children Fund in many countries; activities at the Hopscotch Nursery, London, caring for children whose parents are absent from home during daytime; the work of the Junior Clubs in London; welfare projects in the British Zone in Germany, in the villages of Greece, in Austria, Italy and in many other European countries.
